summary: Smn Mhmdy's Female nord Nio Racemenu Preset.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][i]Smn Mhmdy's[/i][/font] [font=Arial][size=1]Female Nord[/size][/font] [b][size=3]Nio[/size][/b] [font=Georgia]Racemenu Preset.[/font]
[b][img]https://serving.photos.photobox.com/202924205e0cdfad05f146f4c91656e5bed57616f5c762bdca17d8b5939e167a4b7cf43d.jpg[/img]﻿
REQUIREMENTS[/b]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url]﻿
﻿
[b]OPTIONAL [/b][size=1][i][font=Georgia]Recommended[/font][/i][/size]
[i][font=Georgia][color=#dbb0a7]- Nio’s Face -[/color][/font][/i]
Hair: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/]Apachii Sky Hair Female[/url]﻿﻿
Brows: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]﻿
Eyes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url]﻿
[i][font=Georgia][color=#dbb0a7]- Nio’s Body -[/color][/font][/i]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/]SG Texture Renewal[/url]﻿ (JustBody, No Face. Read below description for more information)

[b]VERY OPTIONAL[/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30/]No More Blocky Faces[/url]﻿
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7127/?]Rans Type-C Headmesh[/url]﻿﻿

[b]SG TEXTURE RENEWAL[/b][font=Georgia] Note[/font]
I don't use SG Textures on my females [b]faces[/b], so, [color=#dbb0a7]Nio's face sho﻿wn in screenshots may be different with FULL SG TEXTURE RENEWAL[/color]. However i uploaded edited SGTexture files without Head and Face textures and you can delete your original SGRenewal and Install Nio's Version.[color=#76a5af] [/color][color=#dbb0a7]However[/color], Nio's face with full SGTexture is beautiful too, It's your decide for using SG or NIO'S EDITED SG located in Optional files section.

[b]INSTALLATION[/b]
Download and Install with NMM or Manually extract files in your skyrim installation folder.[/center][center][b]USING PRESET[/b][/center][center]Open console by hitting ~
Enter "Showracemenu" in console without quotation marks
Close console by re-hitting ~
Set race to Nord and Sex to Female
Click on presets tab on top-right of the screen.
Press F9 and select [font=Georgia]Smn Mhmdys Nio.jslot

[/font][b]ARMOR MODS USED IN SCREENSHOTS[/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79489]Lind's Marksmage Garb[/url]﻿ / [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80826]Woodland Alchemist Dress[/url]﻿
﻿[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68028/?]UNP Spice Gear Collection[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376]UNP Minidresses Collection[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31813]West Wind Assault Armor[/url][/center]
author: SmnMhmdy
